subject: Suicides and Suicide Attempts
lead_paragraph: The former champion Edwin Valero, whose career sported 27 straight knockouts and who flaunted a tattoo of the Venezuelan president, Hugo Chavez, on his chest, hanged himself in his jail cell on Monday.
snippet: The former champion Edwin Valero, whose career sported 27 straight knockouts and who flaunted a tattoo of the Venezuelan president, Hugo Chavez, on his chest, hanged himself in his jail cell on Monday.
